title: Atelier Vegan
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Western, Fast food, Bakery, Vietnamese, Take-out only
description: Vegan store offering delivery and takeaway, est. 2016 (previously at 34 Cao Ba Quat). Offers ready-to-eat vegan food and sweets. Sells vegan clothing, shoes, coloring books, postcards, plus organic vegetables from its own farm. Menu includes pizza, falafel and made-in-house ice-cream. Vegan dishes sell out early so send an SMS to 016-8878-6666 to confirm availability and order. Eat-in available only Fri-Sun.
